value.title: Dataflows and power query - November 2020 update
value.excerpt: Have you seen the new and upcoming features released on November 2020 for Dataflows and Power Query? In today's video, I will go through them so you stay up to date:  00:00 Intro 00:24 New Diagram view 01:36 New schema view 02:16 Add column from example  02:20 Add web from example 03:13 Fuzzy grouping

value.title: DAX Fridays! #105: ISINSCOPE
value.excerpt: The DAX function ISINSCOPE, allow us to work with hierarchies in Power BI. In this video I will go through an example on how to do that. This DAX function was introduced in the November 2018 Power BI Desktop Update, so make sure you have that installed if you wan to test it out.  Other resources:  DAX

value.title: DAX Fridays! #11: Using variables in DAX
value.excerpt: Variables are an extremely useful feature in DAX, but perhaps not a well known one. Variables, 1. Make your formulas more readable 2. You can reuse them through your report 3. Can also be tables 4. Are more efficient  Download our Growth dashboard if you want to see the example live:http://curbal.com/blog/the-ultimate-dashboard-to-track-your-website-growth-with-google-analytics-and-power-bi-supercharged-excel
